Question: In 1993, this person was found to have prostate cancer, for which he was successfully treated.
Hints: This person graduated valedictorian out of his class of 150, and his IQ was tested at 168.
This person was promoted to captain in July 1961 and reassigned for Advanced Infantry School at Fort Benning for eight months.
This person anticipated the war to last several weeks, and had anticipated chemical weapons attack by Iraq, which did not occur.
